example.p: stopDice -- stops the animation when the user stops the motion

description.overview: Handle the motionEnd message to perform an action when a motion stops.

parameters.parameter: The motion is the type of motion detected by the device.

description.comments:
The motionEnd message is send to the current card of the defaultStack when the end of a motion is detected by the device.
As of iPhoneOS 3.0 the only motion that is generated is "shake".
